pullRequest.body:
Add a `IsGroupoid` typeclass that asserts that a category is a groupoid, i.e that every morphism is an isomorphism. Add the `IsGroupoid` pendent of some of the instances in `CategoryTheory.Groupoid`. 

---

By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (). Happy coding!
<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->

The proof is found automatically:
```suggestion
  inv f := CategoryTheory.inv f
```

```suggestion
  all_isIso {X Y : C} (f : X  Y) : IsIso f := by infer_instance
```

This is a particular case of a lemma
```lean
lemma isGroupoid_of_reflects_iso {C D : Type*} [Category C] [Category D]
    (F : C  D) [F.ReflectsIsomorphisms] [IsGroupoid D] :
    IsGroupoid C where
  all_is_iso _ := isIso_of_reflects_iso _ F
```
We need to import `import Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Functor.ReflectsIso` for this, but this runs into an import cycle it seems.

(I guess we could split `CategoryTheory.Functor.ReflectsIso` into two files, one that only contains the def, and one that imports `CategoryTheory.Balanced` and `CategoryTheory.Functor.EpiMono`, but that might be work for an other PR).
Yes, the best would be to proceed first with the splitting of `ReflectsIso`, and then add `IsGroupoid`.

pullRequest.title: feat(CategoryTheory/Groupoid): `IsGroupoid` typeclass
